title: ICT sustainability tools - draft
description: A list of tools that help assess environmental sustainability of IS services

tool_name.description: The tool must have a well identified name and not being just an item in the menu of a bigger tool (e.g. not the “sustainability check” option in a development tool)

organization.description: The legal entity having the intellectual property of the tool.

website.description: The tool must have a dedicated web page (landing page, github repo, etc.) describing its functionalities, its licensing, a.s.o . Required format is a URL.

assessment_type.description: Type of assessment the tool is designed for

perimeters.description: What is the general scope covered by the tool. Several values are possible:
enum: Infra / Cloud (for example: GCP, AWS, Azure, OVH Cloud)
Software / Mobile Apps (for example: Android App, iPhone App)
Software / Web Apps (for example: React, Spring, Node.js, ROR, PHP apps)
Software / Web Content (for example: WordPress, Drupal, Prestashop, Magento, etc.)

environmental_indicators.description: Environmental indicators utilized by the tool
enum: Final Energy consumption (usually in Joule per WattHour)
GWP: Global Warming Potential aka the carbon footprint usually in CO2 equivalent
ADPf (MJ): Abiotic resource Depletion Potential for fossil fuel usually in Antimony (Sb) equivalent
ADPe (Sbeq): Abiotic resource Depletion Potential for element (minerals, etc.) usually in Antimony (Sb) equivalent
Water Depletion also called water footprint

functional_units.description: Functional units considered in the assessment

enum: Not Applicable (to be selected if the tool is not based on an LCA)

life_cycle_step.description: Life cycle steps covered by the tool

licence.description: Describe the legal environment of the intellectual property of the tool

self-hostable.description: Indicates whether the tool can be self-hosted

originating_country.description: Country where the tool originated (ISO 3166-1 alpha-3 country code)

logo.description: URL to the logo of the tool

methodology_transparency.description: Level of transparency in the tool's methodology
enum: Disclosed only to internal stakeholders or clients

inside_model.description: Main model being used for the evaluation

main_data_source.description: Main data sources used to build the the model

main_scientific_sources.description: Main scientific sources utilized by the tool

main_focus.description: Primary focus area of the tool

focus.description: Additional focus areas of the tool

quick_description.description: Ideally it should be the description provided by the owner of the tool.

status.description: Describe where the recording stands in the listing process:

last_edit.description: Date and time of last edit

last_editor.description: Editor who made the last edit
